title: Captured by the Kraken
description: Monsters are supposed to be myths--cautionary tales told to teach us of danger. They're not supposed to be real.I never used to believe in them until I find myself captured by a Kraken shifter. He claims I'm his Fated One--his Treasure--and that a soulbond woven by fate cannot be undone.I doubt he's ever going to let me go. And now I find myself wondering: What does it mean to be fated to a Kraken shifter?**Steamy content. Not a dark romance****Release date is a placeholder and will be moved forward when book is ready**
author: Jessica Grayson
